directions: Combine first 6 ingredients in medium bowl. Season to taste with salt and pepper. (Can be prepared 1 day ahead. Cover and refrigerate. Bring mixture to room temperature before using.)

Prepare barbecue (medium-high heat). Brush fish generously with oil. Season with salt and pepper. Grill until just cooked through, about 3 minutes per side. Transfer to plates. Stir parsley into eggplant mixture and arrange atop fish. Drizzle lightly with oil and garnish with lemon wedges.
ingredients: 3/4 cup green olives with pimiento, quartered
title: Grilled Swordfish with Eggplant, Anchovy and Green Olives
